channel.title: Run Bat Fatal Error [Help]
channel.description:
Hey so i just finished downloading this souce [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,566991.0.html](Source)[/url] And it gave me an error after i changed my java path...
[code]FaithScape Starting, do not close! Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...[/code]
If you know what to do It would be great if you could share it with me thanks alot also this is my run bat code: [code]@echo off title FaithScape Source, Running color 70 echo FaithScape Starting, do not close! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Run Bat Fatal Error [Help]
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

Hey so i just finished downloading this souce url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,566991.0.html[/url] And it gave me an error after i changed my java pathâ€¦

FaithScape Starting, do not close! Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

If you know what to do It would be great if you could share it with me thanks alot also this is my run bat code:

@echo off title FaithScape Source, Running color 70 echo FaithScape Starting, do not close! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
